metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3548 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in dmg2img through 20170502. dmg2img did not validate thesize of the read buffer during memcpy() inside the main() function. Thispossibly leads to memory layout information leaking in the data. This mightbe used in a chain of vulnerability in order to reach code execution.

criterions.comment: dmg2img package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
